attributes.action: Reverse HM Treasury vehicle tax changes of 2014 as they are unfair to buyers
attributes.additional_details: This is another ploy for HM Treasury to defraud us of even more money. Of course, it's illegal to drive without vehicle tax, so one has no choice.
attributes.background: Currently if one taxes a car at any time other than the 1st of the month, the buyer loses on the value of up to 30 days of tax. E.g., I purchased a vehicle and applied for 6 months road tax on 26th October. The tax was backdated to the 1st Oct. This meant I paid for 25 days of tax I did not receive.
